website_summaries.verdict: For people with rolling chairs who want to protect their floors and still be able to see them.
pros: Clear finish allows you to see your hard floor beneath the mat
Holds in place with static, but doesn't throw static off the top
cons: The mat doesn't have its own anti-slip coating and may move if not secured

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: This is a scam. Do not buy! It's a piece of plastic from China. No grip, no environmentally friendly logo. Literally just a rolled up piece of plastic. Probably costs $1. Amazon needs to protect consumers more.
customer_reviews.author: Christina A. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: looks good but it moves and i had several people wipe ...
customer_reviews.text: looks good but it moves and i had several people wipe out when they were walking across it. could've used a tacky bottom to keep it in place. i ended up returning it for safety reasons and purchased Floortex Unomat Polycarbonate Anti-Slip Mat for Hard Floors and Very low Pile carpets. Clear, 47 x 35 Inches, Rectangular (128920ERA) which was far better and stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy floor mat at a good price. Used on part hardwood and covering a corner of my rug.
customer_reviews.text: Not being an expert of connoisseur of chair mats for office chairs, I can only say that this mat does what it's supposed to do. I have a somewhat unique situation in that my chair is about 75% on hardwood floor (which is fine) but also runs over the corner of our living room rug. Since I didn't want to move anything, I figured this nice mat could protect it and it does just that. The chair rolls on and off the mat nicely, with a very minimal bump, but one which requires no extra effort. Also, bonus points because it required no time to unroll from the package. Nice and rigid and floor ready within seconds.
customer_reviews.author: James Carlsen

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mat for several weeks now, and so far it's been great. The spikes on the back hold the mat in place, but are not super sharp like some other mats we've had in the past. We have a low-pile carpet which is what this mat was recommended for, and it has not moved at all. The chair does not even leave indents in the mat and it slides very easily. Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Dot L.

customer_reviews.title: ... quickly and in large box unfolded so it was easy to lay out and did not require any unrolling
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly and in large box unfolded so it was easy to lay out and did not require any unrolling. Unfortunately the item appeared used straight out of the box with scratches and two stickers placed over each other in the corner that are nearly impossible to remove. Looks like it may be an original sticker with the new label over it. Seem like it would be a good floor protector but very disappointed that it came scratched up.
customer_reviews.author: LAH

customer_reviews.title: Cracked within 2 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about 2 minutes, then it cracked. FYI, I weigh around 170lbs and I used a regular office chair.... laaaaaaaaame!
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Be vary careful
customer_reviews.text: If I had not destroyed the shipping material I would return this item. It is dangerous!!! It is advertised for smooth surface floors. We have wood floors and my wife and myself have both fallen down (both seniors) because it slipped away as we approached the desk chair. We have one by a different vendor that does not easily slide on the same floor that is used under my chair. We have the correct side down. I would not use this item on a wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Herky

customer_reviews.title: Mat is not as transparent as the picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I thought it was more transparent so I can see my hardwood floor beneath it. It is not as clear/transparent as in the picture. It's quite foggy looking. It seems made well and functionally will serve its purpose. But it no where near as transparent as the picture. This is likely due to the surface being textured so your chair doesn't slip and slide around. The bottom which touches the floor is very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Jared L.

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Lies flat right out of the box. Seems solid, thick enough to protect my pine floor. No nasty plastic smell like the PVC mats. Made in Germany. Now isn't that novel? I hope it's a Mercedes and not a VW.
customer_reviews.author: takhi rider

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and the right size for me.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of theses and they are of high quality. I would order again if I ever needed again. The availability in this narrow shape was exactly what I was looking for.. These flattened out immediately after being shipped rolled up and required no time to return to the original shape..
customer_reviews.author: D. Bellouny

customer_reviews.title: Getting Creative - Alternate use of the mat (Dog Owner)
customer_reviews.text: I have two Shih Tzus who are trained to the pad. However there are the occassional accidently where one of them gets it wrong and manages to spary some outside the pad. Since most of my house is wooden flooring I was worried about the long term damage this may cause to the floor. So I was looking for an addtional layer of protection for the floor and I found this. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Habs

customer_reviews.title: Slipping Hazard NO MORE
customer_reviews.text: Can't use it. Because it downst really have anything to grasp (plastic on laminate floors) it slips around like crazy. Each time we stepped on it without thinking we'd slip. Quite dangerous. Would have returned but the shipping box was already in the trash (over zealous cleaning moment). We are using a throw rug. UPDATE: since my original post regarding the slippery mat, I have been working with Iconik Directly. Their customer service is superb. They sent a different floor mat that doesn't slip at all. Excellent new mat and excellent company to work with. I highly recommend their product(s) because they obviously stand behind them and want happy customers - which I AM!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works. Just.
customer_reviews.text: Satisfactory. Exactly as described. Only criticism is that if the designer/maker had field tested the mat, the mat would be wider. As it, only really works back and forth, not side to side. Even a little wider would make a big difference. No deception here. But it is not my job to design a better mat.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Reilly

customer_reviews.title: the chair legs don't leave indents as bad as other chair mats
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chair mat as a replacement to a cheap Office Max mat. I've been using it for two weeks now. This is a hard plastic, compared to the soft plastic of other mats. As such, the chair legs don't leave indents as bad as other chair mats. The spikes underneath are pretty small, but I've found that it is much preferable to the big spikes, even on medium pile carpet like mine. This is because big spikes break off easily, whereas these smaller ones have not broken off yet. Overall, very good mat for the price. I also really like that they offered it as a rectangular mat without the silly cutouts at the end like a "classic" mat.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: After much searching, we finally settled on this for our computer chair and new hardwood floors. I gave it 4 stars because my husband and I have both slipped on it. It's definitely not nearly as transparent as the picture shows. It is a bit smaller than I anticipated, but it is likely because I didn't pay much attention to the dimensions. We are overall pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the one. So many things right with it. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This mat is perfect. Never slips. Only had it for a week or two, but it seems very much built to last. Very convenient size and shape, I had never bought a mat before, and was't sure what dimensions to get. This one is great. I never go over the edge to the carpet, even when rolling back to get out of the chair. It's solid, not flimsy. Also the slight texture makes the chair rolling not go out of control, but still have rolling freedom. It's not that rubbery kind that you can roll up, and easily roll off of, or sink into. This one is solid, I love it and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terrible; slips easily on wooden floor; appears flimsy.. would rather throw away than take the hassle of sending back.. Update: The customer service is amazing. They took ownership and sent me a new mat at no cost to me, even though I offered them payment for it. The new mat is thicker, not slippery and hence safer in my office where fall prevention is desired. I am happy with the new product and ordered 4 more.. ! (Hence changing the rating to 4.5 stars from current 2 star)
customer_reviews.author: Rahul

customer_reviews.title: Description lies.
customer_reviews.text: High quality mat prevents hard floor from irreversible wear and tear damage This above sentence is in the description of the product along with a picture of a hardwood floor and the product on the floor. This mat was being used to cover 80% carpet and 20 hard floor, the plast spikes on the bottom have destroyed and left scratches, tears and imprints on my apartment hard floor. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS. It is a misleading and risky product, really wish I could review as no stars. Most of the description says carpet but other parts led to me to believe it would be okay on both.
customer_reviews.author: MrScarbearer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Within a month the back portion of this mat curled up about 2 inches off the carpet. Now every time my chair wheels roll off the back they catch on the upturned edge of the mat and I have to stand up and wrestle my chair back onto the mat. I've owned and used dozens of plastic chair mats in my time and this has never been an issue...until this particular mat. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Just received these today and was so pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: Just received these today and was so pleased with them. We had new vinyl floors put down and the desk chair was making a place on it . I had read reviews of some other mats and they said they wouldn't lay flat so I was very apprehensive about ordering these but so glad I did. They were rolled up and taped but they popped right out and lay flat on the floor and the tape and labels peeled right off. For the price these are super.
customer_reviews.author: Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described.. Textured surface but office chair rolls with no issue. 'TEETH' cling to short pile carpet with no slipping yet. Only had a short time, so can not comment about potential cracking.. NOTE: this item is shipped bent (not rolled) into an undersized box.. No damage to product, but open with caution, as it MIGHT pop out unexpectedly.
customer_reviews.author: R&PQ

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it's the right size as the return in costly
customer_reviews.text: I really like the mats. They came flat and are of great quality but, unfortunately, I bought too large a size. When I went to return them, it was at least $10 each in shipping costs to do that. I would barely get half my cost refunded. I did not check to see where they were shipping from, my fault. To date, I'm keeping them and going to attempt to cut them down. It doesn't pay to return. So, make sure you measure and order the right size. Guessing will cost you!
customer_reviews.author: rhannig

customer_reviews.title: Crazy slippery! NO GRIP. Not good for hard wood floors!
customer_reviews.text: I am highly disappointed in this mat. It slides effortlessly across my hard wood floors and has seemingly no grip whatsoever. It's also much stiffer than I expected and maybe that's the reason it slips. The other mats I have are more "rubbery" and never slide. This one slides so badly it's dangerous - I nearly went flying when it walked across it and it slipped out from under me. I am debating whether to deal with the hassle of returning it or maybe cut it up for mouse mats. It's truly too slippery for any conceivable hardwood floor usage.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Passable, but plastic is a little soft
customer_reviews.text: The price on this product is very good, but it comes with a few caveats. The bottom of the mat has channels on it to keep it from moving, but I still notice that it shifts and needs to be respositioned after a few days use. Also, my rolling chair sinks into the plastic a little bit when I'm sitting in one spot for a while. This creates little valleys that hold the wheels in place. On one hand, it's nice to not be rolling around *too* much, but on the other, you have to work a bit to roll out of the valleys. The latter is more annoying to me, so I don't think I'd buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: UrbanExplorerTES

customer_reviews.title: Stuck with this
customer_reviews.text: I'd give a significantly higher rating because the product does exactly what it was designed to do, viz. protect low-pile carpet while enabling easy movement by my roll-around office chair. However, it came with FIVE adhesive tags (and scrap evidence that there had been a sixth), none of which are designed to be removed without an act of Congress (and we know how hard that is). Thus the customer is left with the herculean task of scraping these off with great care (to avoid scratching while getting it all, notwithstanding its willingness to surrender only tiny scraps) OR leave the ugly tags alone, obscuring the beauty of your carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Hand

customer_reviews.title: Not quite right
customer_reviews.text: The product came rolled up..... I have had it for three weeks now and it still has not flattened out - still roll 'waves'. Perhaps in the summer if I put it in the sun it will flatten out. So, because of that, perhaps, It does not stay in place and so at the end of every day I have to reposition it. I have already purchased new products to see if I can get something else to work.
customer_reviews.author: w3

customer_reviews.title: Covered in adhesive gunk and abrasions
customer_reviews.text: What I wanted was a clear mat. What I received actually had a pattern engraved on the underside, making it slight foggy. This problem was minor compared to the impossible to remove adhesive gunk left by not one, not two but three stickers on the mat and a giant piece of industrial shipping tape used to keep it rolled up. The mat also had underside abrasions that left it with big white spots in certain places. If you want a clear mat, look elsewhere because you will never get that effect with this mat for design and packaging reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Koz

customer_reviews.title: It works great! The size is ideal and it has no ...
customer_reviews.text: I use a very heavy power wheelchair and needed this product to help protect my carpet from getting matted or worn through from my wheels going in the exact same track each day. It works great! The size is ideal and it has no problem handling the weight of my wheelchair with me in it (500+ pounds). Sturdy and flexible. Hopefully it will hold up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: Did its job
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. seemed to protect my hardwood floors well. However, I got these:and they are BRILLIANT!!! Chucked the floor mat (well, gave it away) because these 'roller blade style wheels are super! (But those wheels raise the chair about 2" -- so you may not want or be able to adjust your whole work space to accommodate them. I'm still struggling with that!)
customer_reviews.author: Elenor

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: You know in that Jurassic World movie where the kid says, "we need more teeth"? The same could be said here. These mats are awful. The teeth are short stubby and smooth therefore the mat slide all over the place and are constantly tripping people up and making the offices look disheveled because they look as if they've been carelessly strewn all over the floor. We are constantly straightening them. I'm sorry that this review has so many sharp 'teeth' but my advice is to spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Petrarch

customer_reviews.title: Scam! This is a worthless piece of garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this chairmat came rolled up very tightly and although I have unrolled it, it still has not flattened at all. The photo was taken two days after unrolling it. It still has not improved after 2 months. This is a worthless piece of garbage and you would probably have better luck with a piece of saran wrap for how flimsy this thing is. This is a scam and I would avoid buying this chairmat at all costs! I'm extremely dissatisfied and this it the poorest quality chairmat I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa LeBlanc-Williams

customer_reviews.title: TOO SLIPPERY! :(
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the size of the product was not as long/wide as I had anticipated but that's my bad. I purchased 4 of these to use on hardwood floors throughout the house where we have computers. The problem with them is that they slip. My pregnant daughter-in-law got up from her chair and the mat moved under her and caused her to have some discomfort/pain in her groin area. I have also risen from my chair and the mat moves along with the chair and you slide off it. I REALLY don't like that! The mat doesn't stay in one place. It s*** around all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Maria O. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good first impression
customer_reviews.text: The mat arrived in good condition. It was packaged flat, not rolled up. The measurement is listed as 40" x 48", but this is slightly large by about 3/4" in each direction. The correct measurement is100cm x 120cm. The sticker labels came off easily and left no adhesive behind. For the most part, the small spikes on the underside hold the mat in place, although there is a bit of migration. The plastic is clear and tough. Unless there are signs of yellowing, edge curling, or cracks down the line, I'll be perfectly satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Th.C.Sid

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service and Company Stand Behind Their Products.
customer_reviews.text: I thought Israel made better products. Had it for what, two months and it has already cracked right in the middle. The teeth don't grab carpet at all, this thing isn't worth getting. Edit: After working with their customer service, I received a refund for the item since we couldn't find a product that would fit the area I have to use it on. It's rare this day and age that companies will stand behind their items and if they can't resolve the issue offer a refund. So I am amending my review based on their customer service and dedication to their customers, it means a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy mat made in Isreal(?)
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a polycarbon mat for a hardwood floor, and this one is great! I don't think it's polycarbon, but it's much better than a vinyl mat I bought earlier. It's definitely stiffer for sure, and it comes between cardboard sheet unbent. One complaint I have is it comes with 2 white stickers. One that says it's made in Isreal I was able to remove, and one Amazon barcode sticker I wasn't able to remove. They really should do a better job to make sure the product is not ruined by their own stickers (Amazon!). For that, I am taking one star off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice quality, large. stays in place on my carpet.
customer_reviews.text: A little slippery on top. The chair slides too easily. Probably needs to be a little rugged surface on the top of it. I put a small rug under my chair to give me some control over movement. I don't want the chair to move while I am getting up or sitting down.
customer_reviews.author: Bettye L. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great chair mat!
customer_reviews.text: The mat came rolled up in a box so I was concerned it would be curled. It opened the box and I laid it down and it was flat from the first minute. I have deep pile carpet and it works great. Note this mat is only 30 inches wide which happens to be jsut a bit wider then the wheels on my chair. I 'roll' off the mat once in a while, but I don't notice, it is a smooth roll. I have a small area so the 30 inches were perfect. I really am very happy with this mat and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: CINDY C.

customer_reviews.title: The Product Is Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I can't find anything wrong with the product. There is carpeting in my at-home office. When the previous mat finally cracked so much I finally decided to replace it. This mat was the perfect size for my needs. It was delivered in a timely manner. It has now found its new home under my computer chair. If I should ever need another mat I will be sure to check out Amazon for what I need. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: mebekeen

customer_reviews.title: Cracked After 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: The original item arrived folded in a box with visible cracks in it, even though there was large sticker on the mat saying 'do not bend! I contacted the seller and they said this was Amazon's fault. The replacement arrived soon enough, properly packed. But, after 2 months it cracked and needs to be replaced. I work from home so it is in use all day so others may get longer use out of it. The plastic does seem on the thin side however. I will not purchase this again and will try another product.
customer_reviews.author: 88 Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one mat to see how good the quality would be, some of the cheaper brand mats people complained of corners curling up, bad smells, etc. These sturdy, well made mats don't have any of those issues. I think it is worth paying a bit more for quality. I would recommend them. I have only had them for a few weeks and should anything change, I'll do a follow up review.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Thin, sturdy, clear and without the studs normally necessary for carpet.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. As described and exactly what I was looking for. I needed a thin protector for an office chair over an expensive rug. I did not want those with the studs for carpet areas. This is actually designed for use on hard floors. This does the job as I hoped. While it arrived rolled up, it easily flattened with about an hour in the sun. The chair rolls on to it easily. It will prevent marks from the rolling wheels of the chair. Unable to find this exact product and application in local office equipment businesses.
customer_reviews.author: Avid One

customer_reviews.title: Nice floor mat
customer_reviews.text: Nice floor mat. There was absolutely no scent like some plastic can smell. I'm using this to protect my hardwood floor in front of my door because my 16 yr old dog has accidents on the pee pads. The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is because it moves around easily. I'm going to get some type of grippers so it won't move. I just don't want to slip and fall. I'm guessing that if there's a chair on it probably won't move much. It layed down flat immediately no curling. That was great.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for chairs with a wider wheelbase
customer_reviews.text: It did a good enough job. My chair wheel base is a little wider than the lip so my chair rolls over the edges all the time. It eventually caused little stress marks near the corner of the lip and the rest of the mat to appear and now full cracks and a chunk just broke off. That is the only place where I have experienced any failure of the mat. The rest of the mat is in perfect condition. I trust that if the lip matched my chair base there would be no issues. I would suggest that the seller update their listings to include the measurement to help customer select the right product.
customer_reviews.author: StarieNite

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality and the glue from the labels on it spoiled the chairmat.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of this and they are expensive for each piece. They are 3 labels on each piece and the glue residue cannot be cleaned off. When we tried using nail polish remover, it just spoil the chairmat (see pictures). Very disappointed. The mats arrived in 3'x4' flat cardboard making return a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Reality

customer_reviews.title: AVOID
customer_reviews.text: The mat has small plastic spines (pins) protruding from the side that is supposed to be in contact with the floor to prevent it from sliding but the weight of the chair and the person sitting cause the pins (spines) to poke into the wooden floor to get a grip and have permanently damaged my beautiful wood floor. What a terrible product!!! I had to throw it out
customer_reviews.author: Humble

customer_reviews.title: Cracked In Less Than A Month
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's because of past ownership of a plastic mat that's influencing my thoughts on this review a bit here, but I gotta say, this plastic mat feels kinda cheap & started cracking on me, with less than a month of usage. The reason why I add the caveat of "past ownership" above, is because I was kinda expecting a plastic mat that would embed into the carpet, so it'd stay in-place. This one kinda just rests on top of it, and has drifted off a bit from where I first had it. For $53, I expected a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Duvak

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in shipping
customer_reviews.text: Note that product is recycled PET which is much harder and more brittle than PVC. This can be both good and bad but if the item can't make it to your door or even out of its box undamaged, its best to seek another product.
customer_reviews.author: E. Philip Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, compact floor mat
customer_reviews.text: 100% as described. Bought for it's relatively small size compared to others, fits perfectly. It's being used on medium shag carpet and it works beautifully -- no slide on the carpet, thick enough to be useful to slide your chair on. I was pleasantly surprised by the big "Made in Germany" sticker across the front. Not China? Somehow I felt better.
customer_reviews.author: Tholt922

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Performance
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use in a home office with a medium pile carpeted floor. The studs do not hold the mat in place at all. It slides around and requires that I reposition it every day. It's a nuisance. I plan to trash this one and buy one with longer gripping studs. Very disappointed that I wasted the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth I. Feldstein

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Very rigid, much more than I expected. I bought it for sons room to thwart marking up hardwood floors. This is not advisable. Material is very slick and it will slide out from under you. 5/24/2018 Iconik Direct reached out after reading my review and bent over backwards to remedy the situation. They went to great lengths to resolve the issue and for that I am very appreciative. Although this is not the chair mat I needed for my floor type, the quality is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Huffstetler

customer_reviews.title: Love this floor mat
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I' ve had it now two day and its great" It stays on my hardwood floor great no sliding and fits my swivel chair perfect with room to spare. I'm glad I looked around and found this one and its Its all reclycled material. It looks exactly like the picture too. It has a smooth surface on one side and a different surface on the other side (which I like that one for my chair). Great product Gary H
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Would suggest to friends.
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed how well this works. Facts: I'm only 165 lbs., I have a rolling 5 leg chair so the weight is more sparingly distributed, This is only day one of use, I have high pile carpet I've haven't noticed any dimples and based on the construction I do not expect any for some time.
customer_reviews.author: TReal

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I needed a large mat for my husband’s office. Unfortunately, the first delivery was the wrong size. The company was easy to work with but the return had to be sent by UPS and could nit be returned to Kohl’s. The correct size mat is of cheap quality. It came tightly rolled and still shows the roll marks. The end is still curled even after a month. Other than being the right size I would not recommend this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Mfrags

customer_reviews.title: Measure Twice, Buy Once
customer_reviews.text: The mat does what it is supposed to, unfortunately I ordered too small of a size. There is no room for rolling in a typical office chair around your desk as there are only a few inches in either direction (L-R). If you have a small desk or a cramped space it should be fine, but not great for a large office you might roll around in.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Does not slide on my office carpet (low nap). Chair castors do not depress into material so no real effort to move chair around. Yet not so slippery that you roll when you don’t want to. The other reviewer was right – be careful when un-taping out of the box because it’s got a bit of spring in it. The nice thing is that it goes flat immediately. I hope it lasts. If I knew about this earlier, I could have saved $500 in new carpeting. Update - six months of daily use and still great. No dimples no problems; just as good as day one. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DAF

customer_reviews.title: Shipped rolled and then won't flatten out
customer_reviews.text: The mat seems to be made of good material. However, it was shipped in a rolled up position rather than flat. After a week of keeping weight on it it still curls too severely to be usable. Therefore, I recommend against this product until the description explicitly says, "shipped flat."
customer_reviews.author: Technophile

customer_reviews.title: It looks REALLY big in the package!
customer_reviews.text: The chair moves smoothly over my hardwood floor and I'm no longer concerned about the chair's wheels causing color changes or marks on my floor. The two sides are different - one smooth and one slightly rough. There were no instructions to tell me which side was supposed to be against the floor and which one was supposed to be up. I've got the smooth side up. If I'm wrong, will someone please tell me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great. I just moved into a new apartment and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I just moved into a new apartment and I didn't want anything to happen to their carpet so I put this down because I have a chair that rolls. Very well made, just the right size not to get in your way when passing. Fits nicely under your des and extends out about 2 1/2 - 3" from the sides of my desk once inserted where your feet go. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Bkduncan

customer_reviews.title: I bought mine used
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine slightly used so it did have some scratches and needed some cleaning. But overall it has saved my floors and chair. Very thick material and very easy to roll your chair on (be careful). The price was very reasonable and the shipping. On that it came in protected it well.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a mat my cart could roll on in my pantry. The floor is a concrete type. Even though I measured incorrectly, my husband was able to cut it slightly with a jig saw , and it was still perfect. Cart rolls so smoothly now. So glad I purchased it. I received it very quickly, and it was just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Has held up to moderate use fine so far
customer_reviews.text: After almost 9 months of medium duty use (about 6 or 7 hrs per weekday, lighter weight adult, not a lot of rolling back and forth), the mat shows no cracks or other signs of wear. A lot of reviews about chair mats like this report cracking and other problems. IMO the mat is a little too slick in the sense that your chair tends to slide away from your desk without you wanting it to, but some people may consider the ease of movement a feature rather than a bug.
customer_reviews.author: galaxyhiker

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Horrible mats. Slide all over a wood floor. They say non skid. They should say "feel like you're on ice without ice skates" Don't buy this. That was the original review. The company sent out new mats. They are not perfectly non skid but they are a lot better. I have moved them up to 4 stars for their great handling of this. A little more non skid on back and they'd be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: kindle man

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that it is made from recycled materials
customer_reviews.text: smooth surface. Makes moving my chair around a lot more conducent. looks sleek. I like the fact that it is made from recycled materials.Great economic solution
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: didn't expect this mat to be easy to flatter, fairly translucent, and roller friendly. It is all that and more. gave a 5 star after only a few days so dont know what to expect as far as durability. will repost if it falls apart in a month. it came semi folded in a rectangular box. as such if flattened immediately. Only downside, i was conflicted as to size. would like to have a slightly larger width but couldn't find it. Now that i have it, definitely would want wider but it will suffice for my need.
customer_reviews.author: M. Becks

customer_reviews.title: Works for my intended purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I have white berber carpet in my office. My chair has never been a problem, but any dirt on my shoes stains the carpet. I bought this mat to protect the carpet. It works. It was packaged flat. My chair tends to push out from the desk, but that's probably my doing. The insert that goes under the desk keeps my shoes off the carpet. I don't know how it will wear, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: AngelBuyer

customer_reviews.title: high quality - watch out when opening the box
customer_reviews.text: This is a legit floor mat. I bought a cheaper one, and it is not even half as good as this one. This one is quite thick, and feels more like a plastic lid than a roll up floor mat. One word of caution though, mine came in a box. As soon as I sliced open the amazon tape, this mat, flew up at me. This should have shipped in a flat box, not partially rolled up the way it did. It has a lot of tension when it ships that way, and someone could get hurt opening the box
customer_reviews.author: Javier Oropeza

customer_reviews.title: Not Built To Last
customer_reviews.text: This product had two major flaws. First the teeth are not long enough to bite into the carpet so the mat ends up migrating and needing constant adjustment to keep it in place. Second, and probably most importantly, the plastic is cheap and failed after only a few months of use. I bought in March and I already had cracks forming by July and in August the cracks broke through and the product failed. Don't waste your money on this, might be worth it if it were only $20 bucks not for the current price. I thought I was buying something that was going to last me at least a year or two.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Four months in, the cracking began
customer_reviews.text: I've now had it for 5 months and will need to replace it before year's end. It looks good and it did well for the first four months - but the casters of the chair eventually punctured it and now moving around at all is difficult because of the cracks in the mat. It sounds like - even though the carpet is a low-pile carpet, the padding under the carpet may be too thick for this mat. I guess there was no way to be sure. Oh well!
customer_reviews.author: Soonerchick78

customer_reviews.title: This Mat Is Perfect For What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I spent a while looking around for a mat that was the right size and shape to fit under my desk over a very low pile carpet. This one was the perfect size (most rectangular mats were too narrow and I kept rolling off the sides). It did not ship flat as promised, but was in a very loose single circle, so no damage was done and it flattened out immediately. It's tough and sturdy. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Red Pen Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Durable and efficient
customer_reviews.text: It has already proven better than earlier floor covers I have had. It gets a great deal of wear in front of my desk, and others have already begun to crack or fray by now. If I had any suggestion for future models it would be to make it a few inches wider for when I roll my chair around, but I knew the size when I ordered it, which also has some advantages, so that is my problem, not that of the product, which is an unusually good one.
customer_reviews.author: JesseJamesThomas

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product and Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: Crap. It cracked in three places. Give it a month or so. I contacted seller and they wanted me to send it back. How could I find a box to ship it in?! I even sent pictures and explained that their box was unique and I would not be able to ship it back.Unless I broke it in 6 pieces. So I was stuck with it. Horrible customer service and product. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Mommynurs

customer_reviews.title: this time smaller for our front door and am very happy with the product and service The fist one we ...
customer_reviews.text: it is our second purchase ,this time smaller for our front door and am very happy with the product and service The fist one we bought which was a 30x60 went under our two bird cages which protects our new hardwood floors They have a box underneath but some times they miss we will be ordering another 30x60 in front of my desk , the wheels are starting to make lines in the floor. this product lays nice and flat and it blows away any thing i have seen in staples.imho
customer_reviews.author: joeb631

customer_reviews.title: Good Item - but comes with nearly impossible to remove stickers
customer_reviews.text: This is the lowest priced item of this description available on Amazon. It is a translucent sheet of plastic cut nicely to the dimensions noted in the description. Unfortunately, the item arrived with 3 extremely adherent stickers attached to the surface. The stickers were visible from both sides making the item unusable. To remedy this, I needed to go to the hardware store to buy a $2.58 bottle of Goo-Gone to allow me to remove the stickers. So, add @$3.00 and about an extra hour of travel and scrubbing to the cost of the item. Note: the seller was very willing to take this item back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Be careful on wood floors
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and I do like it, however, as a couple reviews mentioned, it is slippery on a wood floor. In fact, I slipped & fell. My fault for not paying attention to where I was stepping but it would have been nice if there was some grip to it. And I've tried both sides, thinking I had it upside-down. It's still a good product for what I wanted. It doesn't slip while my chair is on it...only if it lays alone. I'll have to figure out how to keep it from slipping when my chair isn't on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I selected this mat by size. It fit's my desk space perfectly. VERY happy that it was packaged flat, not rolled up. As soon as it arrived, I put it on the floor and didn't have to wait for it to unroll & relax like most others. It almost disappears once it is down; mostly clear but slightly noticeable; glad I can still see the grain of my new floor through it.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Girl

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the product and the service of the seller
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the product and the service of the seller. Product arrived by the specified date in a large flat box so the chair mat had not been rolled or folded. It was ready for immediate use. I am pleased with the quality. It is exactly as described and what I expected. In the past I used size 45"x 53" and decided to try the smaller size (36" x 48") this time. I'm old and am having a little difficulty keeping my chair on the mat, but I've had it only three weeks. Overall good product and service, and I will purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: ELAINE W SHOAF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something smaller for a small space. I was disappointed that it was hanging out of the box and was chipped and scrapped along one edge. I've never used a chair mat that is so firm. Only time will tell how well this will hold up. Not delivered to the shipping address--rather delivered to the billing address. Not sure why that occurs sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this carpet chair mat to replace an old one I have had for years that had cracked in different places. The Office Marshall Eco-Series mat is sturdy and thicker than my old one, and I particularly like the fact that it was shipped flat, so I was able to use it right out of the box. It looks like a quality product but only time will tell, so, for now, I give it FIVE stars.
customer_reviews.author: MDShopper

customer_reviews.title: Less than 3 months of light usage. Already cracking! Customer service is 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.text: I can usually expect that these pads will last a couple of years at least. April 25, 2016 update. I received a call from the customer service person at Dayton Home and Office. She was very helpful and asked lots of questions in order to try and narrow down the cause of the cracking. She then said that she was going to give me a full refund for the product. Based on that experience, I am pleased with the customer service provided. The customer service experience was one of the best I have had at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thomas Stovall

customer_reviews.title: Warped and Cracked - Not The One To Buy.
customer_reviews.text: This product, initially, seemed great. It has got a harder feel (more plastic-like than rubber-like) than roller mats I've had in the past. This made for better rolling. However, over time (though, I've had the product for less than a year), the mat warped, so that the edges would no longer stay flat on the floor. This made for a terrible tripping hazard. Finally, the mat cracked. Now I need to buy another one. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Robb E. Eason

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far and lays flat...stickers are the only downside....
customer_reviews.text: It is polycarbonate and no off gassing. It arrived in a huge box but lightly rolled end to end but once opened laid flat. It does slide on our laminate floor but I expected it would as the floor is fairly smooth. I will likely cut some very small carpet runners for the front corners to keep it from shifting. Only downside was the amount of stickers, 4 total, that are a pain to get removed without damaging the material or leaving sticky residue. Manufacturing company needs to invest in less sticky stickers.
customer_reviews.author: not a public name

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: My elderly friend has an area rug under his kitchen table and the rug often gets folded up under the chair wheels, causing much frustration on his part, an a great safety hazard. I bought this chair mat for him, and it works perfectly under the chair...halfway on the carpet, and halfway on the wood floor. The hazard is gone, and my friend is so excited he can roll smoothly back and forth! We were surprised the mat arrived in huge box, but that ensured that the mat was not folded, or rolled up, and we were able to use it instantly!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Slippery - risk of falls and liability at home and in office
customer_reviews.text: The top surface is smooth and very slippery, and it greatly increases the risk of falls. Do not buy this to use in a place where people walk in their socks or with wet feet. Even people wearing slippers and dress shoes can easily slip and fall. The other characters of the mat were as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I guess I didn't pay enough attention when buying it.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty thin but seems sturdy enough. My biggest complaint is that it slid around my laminate floor at the slightest pressure. I had to be very careful stepping onto it and fell twice. It's even slipped while I had both feet on it. I finally took it up and am looking for a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Performance Needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I like that I am buying an environmentally sensible product but this mat doesn't work well. It drifts across the rug and I have to move it back to where I want it every few days. I have had it on two different carpets (wall to wall) and it does the same thing, no matter what the pile. I think the prongs on the bottom need to be larger.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: NO CURLING OR MOVING
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a very good product. I chose a thicker mat in the hopes it would last longer. The wheels on the chair do not depress down into the surface and I have not had any issues with it creaping on me, and I do move around a great deal. I would definately purchase this mat again.
customer_reviews.author: GDS

customer_reviews.title: Cracks with use
customer_reviews.text: Delivered flat, served me well, but after 2 months of solid use, it has started to crack. It's disappointing since it's relatively new. ** Edit: Once it starts to crack it gets worse quickly. I would not recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: JudyS

customer_reviews.title: Bad design, material and dangerous.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible may and dangerous. It slips out from underneath and sent me flying today. Ended up cutting my had quite badly. It also curls up and becomes a tripping hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon A. Mcarthur

customer_reviews.title: This chair mat slips and slides on hard surfaces. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have amended my original review of this product because of extraordinary customer service. When Iconik saw my comments about the problems I had with the mat slipping, I was contacted by a customer service rep who offered to send me a replacement that is awesome. It is of great quality and IT STAYS PUT! Thanks so much, Aoife, for reaching out and handling this purchase so that I can now say that I am completely satisfied. Would recommend this product and this company.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: As good as any chair mat, but nothing special either
customer_reviews.text: It's as good as any of these mats ever are. My floors are very slick bamboo and this does not stay put on it's own. A rubber mat would have been a better choice for my floors, but that is not the mats fault. They use a lot of fancy words to describe a giant flat piece of plastic. Would have given it 4-stars, but the rocket scientists that shipped the clear plastic product to me put very heavy-duty shipping stickers all over it that took me about an hour, and some industrial cleaner to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Shutterbug

customer_reviews.title: Works well but not "clear"
customer_reviews.text: Mat works well but needs to note that there is a blue film that is NOT supposed to be removed from the bottom. It is the film that keeps the mat from slipping. I have two mats and the tape stuck to the film on the first one so I thought it was supposed to be removed, but only a portion tore off. So, leave the film be and note that you'll have a tinged blue mat--not clear.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for- buying another!
customer_reviews.text: These are just perfect! (Note that it's about 3/4" smaller in both directions than listed. Also they are semi-translucent but not transparent- the photo is a good indicator that "clear" doesn't really mean "clear." Not a big deal, but good to know.) I bought 2 and I'm buying another right now. They're incredibly inexpensive compared to other similar products, and work just as well. I didn't find mine to be slippery at all, but I suppose that depends on how slick your flooring is. I like that they're firm but not thick, and they were packaged flat.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Friedman

customer_reviews.title: I have pretty normal household carpet
customer_reviews.text: The edges bend up when I sit in the middle of it. I have pretty normal household carpet, and the mat is constantly shifting around on the floor due to the weight of my char bending the mat and allowing it to twist and turn.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mott

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat - wish they wouldn't have stuck three white stickers on it
customer_reviews.text: After spending 15 or 20 minutes trying to peel off 3 white stickers it was great! Wish they'd come up with a sticker that stays put but peels off more easily. Other than that, the mat has made moving my chair around in my carpeted office so much easier. Seems well made and sturdy. No cracking or damage.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: It keeps sliding on the carpet
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this chair mat in my den, and while it's very sturdy, every few days I have to push it back toward the desk. It keeps sliding around on the carpet, and won't stay in one place. For that reason I gave it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Arcadi

customer_reviews.title: Thick and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I really like the thickness of this mat, and sharp under points to grip my rug well. It's smaller than most mats, but I like that because I have limited space. Very pleased at price, and availability. It arrived very quickly and packaged unrolled, ready to place.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Sang

customer_reviews.title: This is the Chair Mat to buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a much sturdier mat than those commonly found in the office supply stores. The edges don't curl up and catch the chair wheels, which is a common problem for this type of product. Sets perfectly on carpet and doesn't move with the chair. The product was delivered on time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product. I liked that it wasn't rolled up so it lays flat. The only thing I don't like about it is that one corner doesn't lay completely flat (think it lifts up because of the weight of my chair) so I have to be carefully not to get my foot caught.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion this is a terrible mat. The "nibs" that are suppose to grip the carpet are too small to grip anything. I have a low pile carpet and the mat slides all over the place. If it were not for the size and how it shipped, I would have returned it. Very dissatisfied with the product. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S.

customer_reviews.title: Cracking after 6 months, worse after 9 months.
customer_reviews.text: After around 6 months of usage I started noticing small cracks. These have gotten much larger now. I have a simple office chair with very basic wheels and am an average weight for my height. The carpet in my office is very low plush and couldn't be contributing the cracking. Considering the prices and "features" notated for this product, I expected it to retain its unbroken form for quite a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G. Bishop

product_meta.title: Office Marshal Chair Mat for Hard Floors | Eco-Friendly Series Chair Floor Protector | 100% Recycled (PET) Floor Mat for Office or Home Use | Multiple Sizes | Translucent - 30'' x 48''
feature_bullets: ECO-FRIENDLY SERIES: Certified with the Blue Angel eco label for a healthy indoor environment, the new Office Marshal exclusive eco series chair mat is your eco-friendly solution to floor protection. Made from 100% recycled PET, these floor mats are a great way to reduce your carbon footprint whilst maintaining the Office Marshal superior standard of floor protection - non-toxic, 100% recyclable, BPA & phthalate free, and free from tin, lead and other metals.

PREMIUM PROTECTION: Designed to mimic the strength and durability of the original Office Marshal polycarbonate mats, the eco series chair floor protectors are rigid and durable. Protects all hard floor surfaces including wood, laminate, tile, stone and vinyl, whilst remaining odor free and free from volatile toxic compounds to keep a healthy indoor environment.

EFFORTLESS ROLL, STABLE GRIP: The unique surface texture of these floor protectors allows your office chair to move easily while carrying out daily tasks, but has enough grip to maintain controlled rolling so the chair doesn't skid around. Ease of rolling between tasks promotes ergonomic posture and helps to considerably reduce the risk of leg fatigue.
TRANSPARENT: This mat for your office chair helps protect while not taking away from the beauty of your floor.

DURABLE: Our desk chair mats are designed for use on hard floors. Office Marshal best-selling chair mats are designed to provide high impact resistance and under standard use will not crack, curl, break, scratch or discolor.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars1,641 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
